name.baseName: Steel production ; blast furnace iron making, steelmaking, steel rolling
钢生产 ; 高炉炼铁、炼钢、钢材轧制

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: 文献里只提供了部分污染物排放数据，未提供原材料和能源消耗清单

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: For example, the generation of 1 kW h (kW h) of electricity is adapted as the functional unit in this study, and the corresponding amounts of CO2 emissions and air pollutants (SO2,NOX and PM10)perkWh of electricity are chosen as the indicators for environmental performances, and the monetary value (US$) of per kW h of electricity is chosen as the indicator for cost-effectiveness evaluation.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: In this study, the typical wind farm system in Yulin City of Guangxi of Zhuang Autonomous Region China was selected as a case study site. The developer, namely, China Huadian Corporation, is a state-owned enterprise and devotes to develop wind power by providing wind power equipment and related service in China [37].
本研究选取中国广西壮族自治区玉林市的典型风电场系统作为案例研究地点。开发商即中国华电股份有限公司，是一家国有企业，通过提供风力发电设备及相关服务，致力于在中国发展风力发电[ 37 ]。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset describes the life cycle of wind power systems used for electricity generation, including key stages such as production, transportation and installation, operation, maintenance, and end-of-life recycling and disposal. The wind farm, operated by China Huadian Corporation, features turbines with a capacity of 1.25 MW each and is designed to support the energy grid with renewable power for a duration of 20 years. The process inputs non-renewable energy at various phases and takes into account raw material and fossil fuel consumption, emissions, and cost-effectiveness which are critical for the operation.
此数据集描述了用于发电的风力发电系统的生命周期，包括生产、运输和安装、运营、维护以及报废回收和处置等关键阶段。风电场由中国华电股份有限公司运营，每台风力涡轮机的容量为1.25兆瓦，并且旨在为能源电网提供可再生能源，设计使用期为20年。该过程在各个阶段投入了非可再生能源，并考虑了原材料和化石燃料的消耗、排放以及在运营中至关重要的成本效益。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: According to Introduced by the life cycle assessment approach [34,35], firstly the system boundaries boundary of wind energy as well as and thermal power are first identified. Then, methodology on evaluating both environmental and economic benefits is presented so that co-benefits can be quantified followed by the introduction of the methodologies on environmental as well as economic impacts evaluation from the co-benefits perspective.
根据引入的生命周期评价方法[ 34、35 ]，首先确定了风能和火力发电的系统边界。然后，提出了评价环境和经济效益的方法，以量化共同利益，并从共同利益的角度介绍了环境和经济影响评价的方法。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: This wind farm is equipped with 24 wind turbines, with a production capacity of 1.25 MW for each turbine, and t the operation life for each turbine is expected to be 20 years. The life cycle of one wind power system can be divided into five stages, including (1) production, (2) transportation and installation, (3) power generation, (4) maintenance, and (5) end-of-life recycling and disposal. The input of non-renewable energy has been shown in each stage. In this study, raw material, fossil fuel consumption and corresponding emissions have been taken into account of a life cycle process. Meanwhile, cost-effectiveness of a wind farm is considered because the cost plays a very important role in operating a wind farm [38]. Considering the data reliability and availability, the cost data of this wind farm was mainly extracted from a feasibility report of one wind farm (with a designed capacity of the 49.5 MW) in Kang ping County of Liaoning province [39].

该风电场装有24台风电机组，每台机组的生产能力为1.25 MW，预计每台机组的运行寿命为20年。风电系统的生命周期可分为5个阶段： (1)生产制造、 (2)运输和安装、 (3)发电、 (4)维护和 (5)报废回收和处置。不可再生能源的投入在各个阶段都有所体现。在这项研究中，原材料、化石燃料的消耗和相应的排放都考虑了一个生命周期过程。同时，考虑风电场的成本效益，因为成本在风电场运营中扮演着非常重要的角色[38]。考虑到数据的可靠性和可获得性，该风电场的成本数据主要取自辽宁省康平县某风电场(设计容量为49.5 MW)的可行性报告[39]
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset for life cycle assessment, consider the detailed segmentation of the wind power system's life cycle into its various stages to accurately model the energy and material flows. For environmental impact assessments, use the provided indicators for CO2, SO2, NOX, and PM10 emissions along with the economic evaluation based on the monetary value per kilowatt-hour of electricity generated. Ensure adherence to the methodological approaches outlined for assessing co-benefits. Cross-reference with feasibility reports for data reliability and take note of the system boundaries defined for wind energy and thermal power comparison. Adjust the data as necessary based on geographical and temporal changes.
在使用此数据集进行生命周期评估时，要注意将风力发电系统的生命周期详细划分为各个阶段，以准确模拟能源和材料流。对于环境影响评估，请使用所提供的CO2、SO2、NOX和PM10排放指标以及基于每千瓦时发电量货币价值进行的经济评估。确保遵循评估共利效应所概述的方法论途径。使用可行性报告交叉参考数据的可靠性，并注意已定义的风能和火力发电比较的系统边界。根据地理和时间的变化适当调整数据。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 文献里只提供了部分污染物排放数据，未提供原材料和能源消耗清单
